text: Tini tomadera kache tomadera madhye theke'i ekati drstanta churamchena -- tomadera dana hata yadera dhare rekheche tadera madhye theke ki tomadera jan'ya ansidara rayeche amara tomadera ya jibanopakarana diyechi tate, -- phale tomara ete ekasamana, ara tadera ksetre tomara bhabana-cinta kara tomara nijedera sanbandhe tomadera bhabana-cintara n'yaya? E'ibhabe'i amara nirdesabali byakhya kari se'i lokadera jan'ya yara bud'dhisud'dhi rakhe.
